name: Sniper Survival - FPS War Game
description:
Get ready to experience the best shooting game for free with Sniper Survival - FPS War Game.
Go behind enemy lines, equip your sniper or assault rifle and aim to start shooting your enemies right in their stronghold. So if sniper FPS games or war games is your thing, then you'll find Sniper Survival - FPS War Game to be one of the most fun and addicting shooting games.
Play your role in the global war against terror and fight crime in this ultimate shooter FPS game.
Sniper Survival - FPS War Game features top notch 3D graphics and awesome slow motion animation effect. With several exciting missions to complete and new content to unlock, this sniper game will keep you hooked for days. Unlock different bullets, snipers, and assault rifles to further help you in your missions.
